name: Runner Echo
description:
A small level to run around and do hardcore parkour

Now Updated to Unity 5

Run, Jump, Wall Jump and Slide your way through the level at your own pace.


5/17/15

  • Dashing is back in (was turned off due to bug)
  • Sprinting + Falling from Ledge = Small Jump

10/11/15
  • Fixes to how crouching works

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Left Control / C - Crouch
  • Space Bar - Jump
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Sprint + Crouch - Slide
  • Double Tap WASD - Dash

A game by:

ItsJeff
